title: Enhancing Customer Service Practice Competencies: Functional Consistency-Based Marine Simulator Training Scenario Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical calculations to design safe navigation routes through ship maneuvering simulations under various weather and sea conditions
Learners demonstrate rapid decision-making using mathematical modeling during crisis scenarios in simulator-based team collaboration exercises
Learners must provide evidence through post-training assessments that the simulation environment functionally aligns with real-world maritime operational settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
